name: Vegan Fish Tacos
description: These Vegan Fish Tacos are incredible! Made with crispy beer battered vegan fried fish, creamy and tangy sauce, and colorful, crisp toppings, theyâ€™re the ultimate vegan tacos you can serve on Taco Tuesday.
recipeIngredient: 1 Recipe Beer Battered Vegan Fried Fish
1/4  white or red onion, finely diced
crumbled vegan cheese (I used Violife Feta, reminds me of Cotija cheese!)
1-2  limes, cut into wedges, for serving

recipeInstructions.text: First, go make the fried vegan fish.
recipeInstructions.name: First, go make the fried vegan fish.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare all the taco toppings, and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Prepare all the taco toppings, and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, combine the sauce ingredients and whisk until smooth. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a small bowl, combine the sauce ingredients and whisk until smooth. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Once the fish are fried, warm the tortillas. You can quickly toast them on a dry skillet over medium/high heat, or wrap several in paper towels with a little water drizzled on them and microwave for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Once the fish are fried, warm the tortillas. You can quickly toast them on a dry skillet over medium/high heat, or wrap several in paper towels with a little water drizzled on them and microwave for 1 minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble: Place a few pieces of fish in each tortilla, followed by toppings of choice and finished with a generous drizzle of sauce. If the "fish" are rather large, slice them into a few smaller pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Assemble: Place a few pieces of fish in each tortilla, followed by toppings of choice and finished with a generous drizzle of sauce. If the "fish" are rather large, slice them into a few smaller pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with lime wedges for squeezing over the tacos and enjoy immediately.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve with lime wedges for squeezing over the tacos and enjoy immediately.
